section.title: Inserting Cross References
section.p: Cross reference links to Word documents or to content inside of them can be inserted by invoking the Link Cross Reference... action from the contextual menu.
Example: This is a cross reference to a heading inside the Word document: First Heading.
Example: This is a cross reference to a table inside Word document: Second Heading/table.

section.title: Inserting Content References
section.p: For referencing reused content from Word documents, you can invoke the Reuse Reuse Content... action from the contextual menu.
